0.title: About this blog
0.content: . Hello, this is Mandy’s blog. I am a software engineer, graphic designer, illustrator and musician. This Jekyll blog was started to: . | make my README prettier | post my vegan recipes | migrate my gists to a structured, searchable place | more to come! | .

1.title: Why Jekyll?
1.content: There are many CMS options such as WordPress, Squarespace, Wix, and cooler features if I used React, Laraval or Ruby and Rails. Why Jekyll? . | Static sites are blazing fast | Easy fast and free to deploy | A bunch of documentation and prior discussion | Ruby is a joy to use | .

2.title: About this Theme
2.content: This is the base Jekyll theme. You can find out more info about customizing your Jekyll theme, as well as basic Jekyll usage documentation at jekyllrb.com . | You can find the source code for Just the Docs at GitHub: just-the-docs / just-the-docs | You can find the source code for Jekyll at GitHub: jekyll / jekyll | You can find the source code for Mandy’s custom theme at GitHub: picaq / picaq.github.io / assets/css/just-the-docs-custom.css | .

4.title: Food
4.content: I am eating primarily whole food plant based. Generally, I also exclude coconut oil. I post my daily meals on Plantee (invite only) Recipes and ingredients in what I eat will eventually be found here: .

5.title: Natto Nacho cheese
5.content: I made natto nacho cheese here’s the recipe . | 50-60 g natto | 1-2 tbsp nooch | 1-1.5 tbsp cashew butter | rice vinegar | tamari | ponzu | yellow mustard | kala namak (and/or salt) | 0.5-2 tsp garlic powder | white pepper powder | 1-2 tsp miso paste (optional) for more umami | sweetener (optional) (date syrup and/or stevia) | cashew milk (optional) to dilute/thin out the final mixture if it is too thick | .

7.title: Recipes
7.content: Below is a list of my published recipes. For most recipes, a stove is not required.

8.title: Sauces & Flavorings
8.content: A collection of my personal favorite sauces & flavorings. I will include a link to my preferred brands but not directly to the products (there are multiple sizes). Generics, where any brand works, are in lowercase.

9.title: Condiments
9.content: Salty . | Roland Vegan Ponzu Sauce | tamari | shoyu | kala namak aka black salt | . Umami . | nutritional yeast aka “nooch” | miso | roasted sesame oil | garlic powder | Erewhon Organic Roasted Peanut Butter | Brooklyn Delhi Roasted Garlic Achaar | TRUFF Spicy Marinara Sauce | . Spicy . I have an infinite spice tolerance. Be warned. | Melinda’s Ghost Pepper Hot Sauce | TRUFF[blank] White Hotter Hot Sauce | harissa sauce | white pepper powder | . Acid . This is good for blending with bitter foods such as bitter melon and natto . | rice vinegar | yellow mustard | . Sweeteners . | blended deglet dates | date syrup | dark brown sugar | molasses | stevia | allulose | monk fruit | Trader Joe’s Marshmallows | .
